SEARCH
Package backgammon

Class BoardSpace

java.lang.Object
backgammon.BoardSpace
Direct Known Subclasses:
Bar, BearedOffSpace, Point
public abstract class BoardSpace extends Object
A BoardSpace represents any space where a checker can reside on the Backgammon Board.

      Returns:

    • getPipValue

      public abstract int getPipValue(Colour playerColour)
      Get the pip value for this board space.
      Parameters:
      playerColour - the colour of the player whose perspective the pip values should refer to
      Returns:
      the pip value for this boardSpace (ie how many spaces away from beared off this space is)
